chameleon.linkage
Interface ILinkage

public interface ILinkage

Interface supporting the linking of chameleon with other applications. note: at the moment this is specifically aimed at the chameleon editor, but in the future this may be broadened

decoratePosition

void decoratePosition(int offset,
                      int length,
                      String dectype,
                      Element el)
Define the given position to have a relationship with the element el defined by the string dectype

Parameters:
offset - offset of the position
length - length of the position
dectype - type of the relationship
el - element of the relationship
